title: No Effects Whatsoever
author: Pebbles
citation: Pebbles. "No Effects Whatsoever: experience with Galangal (ID 98837)". Erowid.org. Jan 7, 2013. erowid.org/exp/98837
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

report: I brewed some tea with 2oz of galangal root following others' recipes. I ground it up in a coffee grinder and steeped the powdered root it in a french press with 2c boiled water for 15min. I consumed it all at once and experienced no effects. Nothing after 30min, 2hrs later....still nothing. No warmth, no visuals, nothing happened.
